properties.description: Indicates the direction that the dropdown will follow when opening
properties.name: direction

properties.description: Indicates the disposition of the menu items
properties.name: layout

properties.description: Indicates whether there will be indicators or not separating the menu items
properties.name: separators

methods.description: Sets up the menu items and its dropdown recursively
methods.name: _setup

methods.description: Sets up the dropdowns with it direction, childs...
methods.name: _setupDropdownMenuItem

methods.description: If the dropdown to be opened exceeds we return an object with data about the sides that have ben exceeded
methods.name: exceesWindow

methods.description: Hides the visible dropdowns of the menu
methods.name: hideVisibleMenuItems

methods.description: Handles the relocation of the dropdown
methods.name: relocateDropdownIfNeeded

methods.description: Creates the click events for the item
methods.name: setupClickEvents

methods.description: Creates the hover events for the item
methods.name: setupHoverEvents

methods.description: Sets up the click events for the menu items
methods.name: setupItemEvents

methods.description: Saves the declarative content to a template to be used when transformed
methods.name: stashMenuItems
